Huda Lutfi bụ onye na-ese ihe nkiri na ọkọ akụkọ ihe mere eme si Cairo, Ijipt. Ọrụ Lutfi gụnyere eserese, collages, na ntinye nke na-egosipụta ụdị dị iche iche gụnyere pharaonic, Coptic, Western, Islamic, na mba ụwa nke oge a.
A mụrụ Lutfi na Cairo n'afọ 1948. O nwetara Ph.D
na Islamic Culture and History na Mahadum McGill
Lutfi sonyeere ụlọ ọrụ nke Ngalaba Arab na Islamic Civilization na Mahadum America dị na Cairo.
